ScriptExtension.Name: Application Window Utilities
ScriptExtension.Author: Aspire QA

RuntimeObject.Name: WindowUtils
RuntimeObject.Method: To return the child element object under the given parent object
To return all the children element objects under the given parent object as an Array
To return the visibility status (true/false) of the child element
RuntimeObject.Description: Provides access to the aspire QA custom Application window utility features

ScriptExtension.Description: Interface to custom application window utilities driver by Aspire QA

ScriptExtension.Name: Logger Extension
ScriptExtension.Author: Aspire QA

RuntimeObject.Name: Logger
RuntimeObject.Method: To Log the given message in Info level
To Log the given message in Success level
To Log the given message in Error level
To Log the given message in Warning level
To return a new enumerator object
To capture the screenshot and save it as image
To Log the given the picture object
To return the RGB color code value
To add screenshot for the given step number
RuntimeObject.Property: Gets or Sets the CurrentResultScreenshotFolderPath attribute
RuntimeObject.Description: Provides access to the aspire QA custom Logger reading features

ScriptExtension.Description: Interface to custom Logger driver by Aspire QA
